casebody.data:
No. 1038,

Mise.

Miller v. Pleasure, Hospital Superintendent. Petitioner pro se. Louis J. Lefkowitz, Attorney General of New York, Irving Galt, Assistant Solicitor General, Philip Watson and John J. O’Grady, Assistant Attorneys General, for respondent.

The motions to correct the docket and to strike the respondent’s brief are denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.
